Mario is a character created by video game designer Shigeru Miyamoto, of the Nintendo company and the protagonist of the eponymous video game franchise.

Princess Peach is a character from Nintendo\'s Super Mario video game franchise. Originally created by Shigeru Miyamoto, Peach is the princess and ruler of the fictional Mushroom Kingdom, where she resides in her castle with Toads and which is constantly under attack by the evil Bowser.

Luigi is a fictional Japanese video game character that was created by Japanese video game designer Shigeru Miyamoto, who along with his brother Mario, form the main characters of the Nintendo company.

Toad is a fictional character from the Mario video game franchise. Created by Japanese video game designer Shigeru Miyamoto, Toad is depicted as a citizen of the Mushroom Kingdom and is one of Princess Peach\'s most loyal attendants; constantly working on her behalf.
